properties.entry: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RANKING_DATA ( id int IDENTITY, call varchar(16), sect varchar(32), code varchar(16), city varchar(16), score int, total int, primary key(id) );
INSERT INTO RANKING_DATA ( call, sect, city, score, total ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
DELETE FROM RANKING_DATA WHERE call = ? AND sect = ? AND city = ? AND score = ? AND total = ?;
SELECT call, sect, city, score, total FROM RANKING_DATA;
SELECT call, sect, city, score, total FROM RANKING_DATA WHERE call = ?;
SELECT call, sect, city, score, total FROM RANKING_DATA WHERE sect = ?;
